RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: Huntsman's gift
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: every lycanthrope present will gain a level in a random totem. If the ritual is of the highest quality then they will gain an additional level in a random totem.

RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: discover feral werewolf pack
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: discover the location of a feral werewolf pack. If the ritual is of the highest quality then there is a 50% chance to discover the location of a second feral werewolf pack.
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.letterInfoText: You have discovered the location of a feral werewolf pack.
